cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP in-streams to 0 causes invalid SCTP configuration, leading to F1 interface connection failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting NR cell ID to 0 causes invalid cell identification, leading to cell configuration rejection and setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 NR 小區 ID 設定為 0 會導致無效的小區識別，造成小區配置被拒絕和設定失敗。
